lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Despite last week's quite strong rally, the depressed stock market and forecasts that it would probably not attract sustained interest from the global investment community made a downturn in commission business most likely.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It is precisely because of bank reporting rules that allow the build up of "hidden" reserves known only to the Bundesbank, that few analysts produced precise earnings forecasts as they did for corporate non-banks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But Alastair France, of London brokers Alexanders, Laing & Cruickshank, said his clculations showed that Deutsche Bank AG <DBKG.
